name: Fracture (itch) (7BenJ7)
description:
You wake up in a dark and isolated place. Fuzzy memories and alone, all you remember is your ability to warp through space. But as you try to survive,  you may start wondering : Who are you ? What is this place ? And why do you seem to yearn for your home...?

Fracture is a student project. We want to create a Zelda-like game with a portal mecanic. You can download the first part of the game, and stay tuned for updates, as this project is just at its beginning ! All feeback is great, so do not refrain from writing comments !
